sentences.en: After being put out, service has received very good market repercussion.
sentences.cn: 服务推出后收到了非常好的市场反响.

sentences.en: It was an effort which was to have painful repercussions.
sentences.cn: 那是一个将产生沉痛后果的尝试。

sentences.en: It would inevitably evoke a strong repercussion among people from different walks of life.
sentences.cn: 它不可避免会引起不同生活北京的人的强烈反响.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the curative effects of Maozhaocao Capsule repercussion of baby after injecting Kajiemiao.
sentences.cn: 目的分析猫爪草胶囊治疗婴幼儿接种卡介苗淋巴反应的疗效.

sentences.en: The president's death had unexpected repercussion.
sentences.cn: 总统的逝世引起出乎意料的反响.

sentences.en: This is probably the biggest repercussion of the calculation.
sentences.cn: 这大概是计算的最大影响.

words.tran_cn: 反响；弹回；反射；浮动诊胎法

trans.tran_cn: 弹回，返回，反响，影响，（光、声等的）反射，浮动诊胎法
trans.tran_en: the effects of an action or event, especially bad effects that continue for some time
